message.raw:
Merged console test from issue_8_2_scpeters.  Made that test behave as expected
by storing the global Console instance as a shared_ptr.  That way, its
destructor will be called on shutdown, causing the logFileStream's desctructur
to be called, causing the stream to be flushed to disk.

message:
Merged console test from issue_8_2_scpeters.  Made that test behave as expected
by storing the global Console instance as a shared_ptr.  That way, its
destructor will be called on shutdown, causing the logFileStream's desctructur
to be called, causing the stream to be flushed to disk.
